subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Chelsea acquired wing Florent Malouda of France from Lyon for an undisclosed fee. Chelsea said on its Web site that it wanted to sign Malouda before leaving for its preseason tour to the United States, which begins Saturday in Stanford, Calif. Malouda, 27, was voted the best player in France’s Ligue 1 last season.
